item.description:
We will be meeting up for appetizers / dinner @ Pho Dakao before heading over to Gilrein's.
This Vietnamese restaurant is reasonably priced and also has had some very good reviews. There is ample parking. They serve beer & wine in addition to other beverages. I am not sure if they will do separate checks? So, if this is the case, I hate to ask but... please make sure you bring enough cash to pay your bill.

*NOTE: I will try to be there earlier. Depending on how many respond I will work on a reservation.
Hope to see you there.
_Jo
item.how_to_find_us: When entering the restaurant ask for the meetup table. There will also be a meetup sign on the table.
item.why: Pho Dakao is reasonably priced and has had some very good reviews.
item.name: Dine Out @ "PHO DAKAO" before Gilrein's
